#summary How to compile Oricutron for Mac OS X
#labels Compiling

= Introduction =

This page describes how to compile Oricutron for 10.3 without Xcode

  * Install the [http://www.libsdl.org/release/ SDL framework]
*sdl-config:*
{{{
#!/bin/sh
case $1 in
--cflags)
        echo -I/Library/Frameworks/SDL.framework/Headers
        ;;
--libs)
        echo SDLMain.o -framework SDL -framework Cocoa
        ;;
esac
}}}
  * Either download and extract a source package from the [http://www.petergordon.org.uk/oricutron/ download page], or [http://code.google.com/p/oriculator/source/checkout check out] the current subversion trunk.
  * Open a shell, and navigate to the Oricutron archive
  * For example type:
{{{unzip -a Oricutron_src_v09.zip -d oricutron}}}

{{{cd oricutron}}}
  * Type:
{{{make}}}

Hopefully, an Oricutron executable should come out the other end.
